channel.title: [508]Project iSoft![508]
channel.description:
[center][u][b]:-The Basic Plans-:[/b][/u]
[u][b]Major Plans![/b][/u] Custom Framework (75%) (I hate Palidino76's Framework) Make the Server Read .xml and support SQL. (XML 95%) (SQL 25%) Login Block. (100%) - Logs in 100% Running System (0%) - Not Started On Running Just yet! Walking. (95%) - Now works with LD/HD Although walking isnt 100% Due to 2 Minor Glitches causing it to crash the client Player Rendering. (35%) - Few Rendering Bugs! (Fixed 3+ Bug) (XTEA) Mapdata Loading. (100%) - We don't have all the mapdata but we have a 100% Mapdata (XTEA) Loading System! Player Loading + Saving System. (5%) - Loads Username + Password (Loading 5%) (Saving 0%) Packs XTEA + Loads XTEA Via A .txt XTEA File like it does on Palidino76's But is more efficent! Economy (0%) - Need to work on an Efficent Market.
[u][b]Minor Plans![/b][/u] Trading - (5%) I will do this my own way instead of using [u][b]GraveDiggahs[/b][/u] Trading tutorial. Shops - (95%) I've Basically used a .Xml loading Method for Shops! Minigames - (0%) Not starting these until nearer to the Release Date. Quests - (5%) Dragon Slayer Base.
[b][u]Minor Updates.[/u][/b] Re-Packaged the whole server! Added a Very Basic SQL System.
[b][u]Updates as of 21/5/09 - 5/21/09[/u][/b] ...Update...
Shops now load 100% Correctly Using a .Xml (Extensible Markup Language) .Xml is a cleaner way to load shops. plus easier to edit. Private Messaging System 65% Programmed Using 5 Differant Handlers (SendPM.java),(ReceivePM.java) (IgnorePM.java), (FriendsPM.java) and (StatusPM.java) - Reason only 65% is because the Friends list + Ignoring list doesnt save + Ignoring Doesnt work! (PM W/out Logs as Private Message's are PRIVATE) although PM's Containing abuse will be automatically Logged. And Split chat doesn't work! Login Bugs are fixed [code]Login Bug 1# Players Login on was making all the other player's disapear (Rendering/Login Bug) Login Bug 2# Wasnt Reading a players Coords. (Saving/Login Bug) Login Bug 3# Players Logged out after several minutes and corrupted there accout (Saving/Login Bug)[/code] There is still an NPC Bug! Where Disconnections may occure (Will try to fix this soon) Added the following Classes. [code]PlayerOption1.java PlayerOption2.java PlayerOption3.java Walking.java Running.java Energy.java Equipment.java[/code] Equipment Now works although there is bugs with it. [b]Certain Items dont wield (Yet are in Items.cfg/Equipment.java)[/b]
Custom Framework: Reason! Palidino76's Framework is Lame. Un-Stable Contain's Alot of Bugs/Glitches, So a Scratch Framework will make the Server alot more Stable!
Pictures will come soon.. Once there is actually somthing to show!
Thanks for reading. Pureman0194[/center]

item.title: [508]Project iSoft![508]
item.dc:creator: @Pureman0194 Pureman0194
item.description:
@Pureman0194 wrote:

Purrie doesn’t matter it’s a nickname…
Technikally

Framework 95%
Login 100%
Running 75% Saves
Login System via SQL 100%[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 21, 2009, 10:08:51 am[/size][hr]…Update…
Private Messaging System 65% Programmed Using 5 Differant Handlers
(SendPM.java),(ReceivePM.java) (IgnorePM.java), (FriendsPM.java) and (StatusPM.java) - Reason only 65% is because the Friends list + Ignoring list doesnt save + Ignoring Doesnt work! (PM W/out Logs as Private Message’s are PRIVATE) although PM’s Containing abuse will be automatically Logged. And Split chat doesn’t work!
Login Bugs are fixed

Login Bug 1# Players Login on was making all the other player's disapear (Rendering/Login Bug) Login Bug 2# Wasnt Reading a players Coords. (Saving/Login Bug) Login Bug 3# Players Logged out after several minutes and corrupted there accout (Saving/Login Bug)
There is still an NPC Bug! Where Disconnections may occure (Will try to fix this soon)
Added the following Classes.

PlayerOption1.java PlayerOption2.java PlayerOption3.java Walking.java Running.java Energy.java Equipment.java
Equipment Now works although there is bugs with it.
Certain Items dont wield (Yet are in Items.cfg/Equipment.java)

Read full topic

item.title: [508]Project iSoft![508]
item.dc:creator: @Pureman0194 Pureman0194
item.description:
@Pureman0194 wrote:

[center]:-The Basic Plans-:

Major Plans!
Custom Framework (75%) (I hate Palidino76’s Framework)
Make the Server Read .xml and support SQL. (XML 95%) (SQL 25%)
Login Block. (100%) - Logs in 100%
Running System (0%) - Not Started On Running Just yet!
Walking. (95%) - Now works with LD/HD Although walking isnt 100% Due to 2 Minor Glitches causing it to crash the client
Player Rendering. (35%) - Few Rendering Bugs! (Fixed 3+ Bug)
(XTEA) Mapdata Loading. (100%) - We don’t have all the mapdata but we have a 100% Mapdata (XTEA) Loading System!
Player Loading + Saving System. (5%) - Loads Username + Password (Loading 5%) (Saving 0%)
Packs XTEA + Loads XTEA Via A .txt XTEA File like it does on Palidino76’s But is more efficent!
Economy (0%) - Need to work on an Efficent Market.

Minor Plans!
Trading - (5%) I will do this my own way instead of using GraveDiggahs Trading tutorial.
Shops - (95%) I’ve Basically used a .Xml loading Method for Shops!
Minigames - (0%) Not starting these until nearer to the Release Date.
Quests - (5%) Dragon Slayer Base.

Minor Updates.
Re-Packaged the whole server!
Added a Very Basic SQL System.

Updates as of 21/5/09 - 5/21/09
…Update…

Shops now load 100% Correctly Using a .Xml (Extensible Markup Language) .Xml is a cleaner way to load shops. plus easier to edit.
Private Messaging System 65% Programmed Using 5 Differant Handlers
(SendPM.java),(ReceivePM.java) (IgnorePM.java), (FriendsPM.java) and (StatusPM.java) - Reason only 65% is because the Friends list + Ignoring list doesnt save + Ignoring Doesnt work! (PM W/out Logs as Private Message’s are PRIVATE) although PM’s Containing abuse will be automatically Logged. And Split chat doesn’t work!
Login Bugs are fixed

Login Bug 1# Players Login on was making all the other player's disapear (Rendering/Login Bug) Login Bug 2# Wasnt Reading a players Coords. (Saving/Login Bug) Login Bug 3# Players Logged out after several minutes and corrupted there accout (Saving/Login Bug)
There is still an NPC Bug! Where Disconnections may occure (Will try to fix this soon)
Added the following Classes.

PlayerOption1.java PlayerOption2.java PlayerOption3.java Walking.java Running.java Energy.java Equipment.java
Equipment Now works although there is bugs with it.
Certain Items dont wield (Yet are in Items.cfg/Equipment.java)

Custom Framework: Reason!
Palidino76’s Framework is Lame. Un-Stable Contain’s Alot of Bugs/Glitches, So a Scratch Framework will make the Server alot more Stable!

Pictures will come soon… Once there is actually somthing to show!

Thanks for reading.
Pureman0194[/center]

Read full topic
